expo_eventInfo_subtitle: Give your expo a name, write an engaging description, and choose the dates.
expo_expoNameMaxLengthMessage: Expo name must not exceed 50 characters
expo_expoNameEmailInvalidMessage: Expo name cannot be an email address
expo_expoNameUrlInvalidMessage: Expo name cannot be an URL
expo_expoStartDateCannotBePastMessage: Expo start date cannot be a past date
expo_expoEndValidation: End date must be after start date
expo_updateExpo_subtitle: Update your expo's details, description, and dates to keep it current and engaging.
expo_deleteExpo_confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this expo? This action cannot be undone.
expo_expoStartValidation: Start date should not be after end date
expo_publishExpo_confirmMessage: Are you certain that you want to proceed with publishing this Expo? Please double-check all the details before finalizing the publication.
expo_unpublishExpo_confirmMessage: Are you absolutely certain that you want to proceed with unpublishing this Expo? Please review all the details before finalizing the decision to unpublish.
expo_expoNameLeadingSpaceMessage: Expo name cannot start with a space
expo_expoNameSpacesOnlyMessage: Please enter a valid expo name; it cannot be composed only of spaces.
select_layout_helper_text: Choose a layout for your online expo
layout_update_warning_message: Changing the layout is not recommended, because it may lead to data loss. If you proceed, you will need to re-enter the details of the stand
agendaContent_network_issue_message: Unable to connect. Check your network and try again.
